sect1.title: Lists
sect1.para: Objects which implement Xyster\Collection\IList have numeric zero-based indexes that contain elements, just like an array. They inherit Xyster\Collection\ICollection as well as the ArrayAccess interface in the PHP SPL.
You can extract slices of the list and insert elements at an index.
The default implementation of a List in Xyster is the Xyster\Collection\ArrayList.
